description: Records_zaman is a record store and specialist DJ based in Agadir, Morocco, sharing songs and mixes from North Africa and the Middle East.

genres.description: Emerging from the Arabic diaspora in France in the 90s & influenced by US hip hop beats, a young, talented and committed scene has sprung up across Egypt, Palestine and Iraq.
genres.short_description: The beats you'd expect, from places you wouldn't.
genres.title: Arabic Hip Hop

title: Records_zaman Radio
